Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Cup of a very simple model: rounded base, flared body and rounded lip in continuation of the walls of the body. The interior surface has been polished and covered with a red wash. The exterior has not been as carefully rendered: cutting marks made while taking the vessel off the wheel are still visible. The clay is fine, common and buff-coloured.
